Directions: In a bowl, combine the flours, baking soda and salt.  In another bowl, combine mayonnaise, sugar and bananas; stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.  Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full.  bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.  Serve warm.
